com.dsf.dbxtract.cdc.journal

Interface JournalHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleJournalHandler, TestHandler, TestWindowHandler

    public interface JournalHandler
    Interface to be implemented by capture executors.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    fabio de santi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBatchSize() 
      java.lang.String getJournalTable() 
      JournalStrategy getStrategy()
      Establish the journal strategy: DELETE - removes imported rows from journal table WINDOW - memorizes
      java.lang.String getTargetQuery()
      The query to retrieve changed data can references columns from journal table as named parameters:
      void publish(Data data)
      Publishes captured data (like writing a file or publishing to a kafka queue).

    • Method Detail

      • getJournalTable

        java.lang.String getJournalTable()
        Returns:
        journal table's name

      • getBatchSize

        int getBatchSize()
        Returns:
        number of rows to be imported for each execution

      • getTargetQuery

        java.lang.String getTargetQuery()

        The query to retrieve changed data can references columns from journal table as named parameters:

        select * from mytable where pk = :pk
        Returns:
        data retrieval query

      • publish

        void publish(Data data)
      throws PublishException
        Publishes captured data (like writing a file or publishing to a kafka queue).
        Parameters:
        data - object Data for captured data
        Throws:
        PublishException - failed to publish retrieved data

      • getStrategy

        JournalStrategy getStrategy()
        Establish the journal strategy:
        • DELETE - removes imported rows from journal table
        • WINDOW - memorizes
        Returns:
        the handler's journal strategy
